title: Anyone knows the name of a good anime to watch?
body:
Few rules:

- Needs to have some sort of comedy or fun characters.
- Have some sort of romance going on, but dont force it down the viewers throat, make it actually believable.
- I don't mind eye candy.
- I don't mind violence or gore.
- The stupider the plot sounds, the better.
- No fucking endings where nothing fucking happens.

inb4 "watch free! ayy lmao"
